p: MOA: as mentioned above, excess stimulation of the immune response leads to an exaggerated release of IL-6, which is responsible for a series of events resulting in organ damage and worsening of the overall clinical condition of the patient. Tocilizumab inhibits IL-6-mediated signaling by binding to both soluble and membrane-bound IL-6R, ultimately causing effective downregulation of the immune system [ 36].
